item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 8, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The Deck: An open-source cross-platform multiplayer card game engine in Flutter (97 points | 20 comments)
2. Your AI Can't See Gorillas (58 points | 24 comments)
3. Do-nothing scripting: the key to gradual automation (2019) (206 points | 48 comments)
4. Show HN: FlashSpace – fast, open-source, macOS Spaces replacement (23 points | 8 comments)
5. Writing a Simple Windows Driver in Rust (14 points | discuss)
6. Obscure islands I find interesting (144 points | 15 comments)
7. Generating Voronoi Diagrams Using Fortune's Algorithm (With Odin) (128 points | 12 comments)
8. The Daughter of Dawn (2024) (5 points | 1 comment)
9. Fat Rand: How many lines do you need to generate a random number? (19 points | 15 comments)
10. A tale of several distros joining forces for a common goal: reproducible builds (60 points | 19 comments)
11. Carbon is not a programming language (sort of) (32 points | 18 comments)
12. Show HN: FreeDemandLetter – A Weapon for Anyone Who's Sick of Getting Shafted (46 points | 31 comments)
13. Hotline for modern Apple systems (416 points | 90 comments)
14. VSCode’s SSH agent is bananas (571 points | 388 comments)
15. No Way Home (7 points | 2 comments)
16. We are destroying software (124 points | 59 comments)
17. Tapestry by Iconfactory (67 points | 36 comments)
18. Station of despair: What to do if you get stuck at end of Tokyo Chuo Rapid Line (468 points | 281 comments)
19. U.K. orders Apple to let it spy on users’ encrypted accounts (633 points | 919 comments)
20. Insomnia, Control (35 points | 15 comments)
21. The LLMentalist Effect (5 points | 1 comment)
22. The Leaning Tower of New York (60 points | 30 comments)
23. The PS2’s backwards compatibility from the engineer who built it (2020) (215 points | 77 comments)
24. Asahi Linux lead developer Hector Martin resigns from Linux kernel (837 points | 830 comments)
25. The practical (Unix) problems with .cache and its friends (30 points | 37 comments)
26. Show HN: Automated Sorting of group photos by user defined N people in each pic (22 points | 1 comment)
27. Starlink in the Falkland Islands – A national emergency situation? (120 points | 143 comments)
28. 'The Licensing Racket’ Review: There's a Board for That (40 points | 79 comments)
29. In Praise of Subspecies (16 points | 5 comments)
30. Show HN: ExpenseOwl – Simple, self-hosted expense tracker (187 points | 75 comments)
